title: Lightning Bolt!
description: You feel the urge to shout 'Lightning Bolt!' at the top of your lungs as you play this card.

title: Give 'em a Left!
description: My Pappy always said a solid Left Hook could solve all of your problems.

title: Stick 'em with the pointy end.
description: Good advice when you give someone their first weapon.

title: Pay day!
description: Finally I can get some food!

title: Abandoned Crossbow
description: You find an Abandoned Crossbow, with a single bolt in it. Make it count!

title: Chair Bat
description: You hit the boss with your work chair. If you stand for the rest of the day your supervisor will give you an extra card draw.

title: Oh.. Thats Gum.
description: You find some bubble gum stuck to the bottom of your desk.

title: Snickers
description: Take your break as you play this card, and eat a snickers. Doing this grants you no bonuses. (except a break and a snickers)
